timeline.message:
Add sql SHOW MAPPINGS/JOBS stmt

The SHOW JOBS command shows all active jobs.

The SHOW MAPPINGS command is equivalent to `SELECT mapping_name as name
FROM information_schema.mappings`.

Fixes #2731
